events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund because it does not match what I originally purchased.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect item.
The case has been assigned to support agent Julia R. for further assistance regarding the refund inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear about the wrong item and I’ll be happy to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide me with your order number and, if possible, a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue quickly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321, and I have attached photos showing the item is not what I ordered originally.
Thank you for the details and photos. We will initiate a full refund for your order and you should see the amount credited to your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the prompt response and refund offer! I appreciate your help in resolving this issue quickly.
The refund has been processed and the case is now resolved. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to make sure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
Since the refund was successfully received and the customer has no further concerns, this case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on your support experience regarding this refund case.
